name: (Pixel)Papercut Gunfire
description:
Your weapon is randomized every try. It'll shoot different amounts and types of bullets, have different firerates, and moves in different patterns (or something like that), same for all of your enemies. Also, they'll die after one shot! But so will you. How long can you survive this (pixel)papercut bullet hell?

Walk with WASD, aim and shoot with the mouse.

Entry for Procedural Generation Jam 2016 (#procjam).
